title: MOOC-based Java Programming Learning Engagement Enhancement Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming knowledge and understanding of Java language syntax
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining face-to-face workshops and online MOOCs, emphasizing project-based learning with hands-on practice using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate learning-execution competencies by completing over 80% of practical assignments using a web-based IDE.
Learners complete and submit five or more real-world programming projects as a portfolio over a six-month course.
Learners participate in online discussion forums at least twice weekly, exchanging peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
